FuncDef:
The port-access-limit command limits the number of access users on a physical port.
The undo port-access-limit command restores the default setting.
By default, the maximum number of users that access a physical port is not configured on an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum number of access users on the physical port.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65536.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The port-access-limit command must be run on the master interface.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
